document_data.name: House of the Guardian
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of the Guardian''' was a local temple to [[Helm]] found in the small city of [[Hluthvar]] in the [[Sunset Vale]].
document_data.Location: It was situated on the northern end of the city's market space.
document_data.Structure: The temple resembled a well-protected, fortified keep, encircled by both a moat and an [[iron]] fence.
document_data.Interior: The House of the Guardian's highest chamber housed the altar to Helm. This altar resembled a upturned [[sword]] that featured the Unblinking Eye of Helm set within its pommel.
document_data.Activities: The temple's score of warrior-priests endlessly trained to keep at bay the [[evil]] forces of nearby [[Darkhold]]. Most Vigilant [[Maurandyr]]. He was known throughout Hluthvar as a stalwart foe of the [[Zhentarim]].
document_data.Defenses: It was said Helm's House boasted an expansive armory complete with numerous [[ballista]]e.
